data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pollet, Marc, Ivković, Marija (2018): Dolichopodidae of riverbeds and springs in Croatia with an updated checklist of Croatia (Diptera). Zootaxa 4455 (3): 401-428, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4455.3.1|5 occurrences
